sentences.en: Average weekly cinema attendance in February was 2.41 million.
sentences.cn: 2月份，平均每周的观影人数为241万。

sentences.en: I can't remember the last time we went to the cinema.
sentences.cn: 我记不得上次我们去看电影是什么时候了。

sentences.en: I myself enjoy cinema, poetry, eating out and long walks.
sentences.cn: 我本人喜欢电影、诗歌、外出吃饭和远途散步。

sentences.en: I prefer going to the cinema to watching TV.
sentences.cn: 我更喜欢看电影而不是看电视。

sentences.en: I took Moira to the cinema, where she fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 我带莫伊拉去看电影，她却在影院睡着了。

sentences.en: I used to go to the cinema every week.
sentences.cn: 我过去每周都去看电影。

sentences.en: In Italy, as elsewhere, television has made deep inroads into cinema.
sentences.cn: 在意大利，跟在别处一样，电视严重影响了电影市场，夺走了大批观众。

sentences.en: It’s on at the local cinema.
sentences.cn: 此片正在当地影院上映。

sentences.en: Let's go to the cinema— there's a good film on this week.
sentences.cn: 咱们去看电影吧，本周在上映一部好片子。

sentences.en: Many cinema-goers were stunned by the film's violent and tragic end.
sentences.cn: 许多来看电影的人都被这部影片暴力而悲惨的结局所震惊。

sentences.en: The fans sat enthralled in the darkened cinema.
sentences.cn: 影迷们坐在黑漆漆的电影院里看得如痴如醉。

sentences.en: The film demands attention, and has no equal in cinema history.
sentences.cn: 那部电影众人瞩目，在电影史上无与伦比。

sentences.en: They thought the arrival of television would deal a death blow to mass cinema audiences.
sentences.cn: 他们认为电视的问世将使观众涌向影院的现象不复存在。

sentences.en: We really were afraid, not like in the cinema.
sentences.cn: 我们是真的很害怕，不是像看电影时的那种害怕。

sentences.en: Working with Ford closely, I fell in love with the cinema.
sentences.cn: 与福特的密切合作开始令我爱上了电影。

words.tran_cn: 放映技师；电影摄影技师

trans.tran_en: a building in which films are shown
a building in which films are shown
